title: Firewall Error After Champion Select
body:
Hello, Ever since the update last Friday I have been unable to load into any games because of the "Firewall Error After Champion Select" error, it's now Monday and the the error is still occurring, so if there are any reds reading this could you please shed some light on the situation and tell me what might of caused this and is there anyway to resolve this issue ?

Cheers LinKFusion.

replies.body: Agree! I understand the process in which you guys are going through to find the problem to be rather tedious, but it'd be good to give an approximate time as to when this will be fixed. Say, next patch?
Next patch will break even more.

I've been experiencing this error too and I've emailed riot, made a thread, filled out their form and emailed my ISP, but so far not a single reply has been received. Looks like LoL is a subscription game now, $10/month for WTFast or %%%% off.

Hi guys

Just want to make sure - did you check out the [sticky thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WlGElu7g-update-firewall-error-after-champion-select) about this issue?

Cheers
-Mindstar

PS.  I know you did, *Psyper*, thanks for the report & info!

Hi Agent Mindstar

I have already sent through my info to you guys, do you have any idea what has caused this issue or how long it will take until it is resolved ?

-Cheers

*whoosh*
